name: Terry's Cilantro Cream Chicken
ingredients: 1 tablespoon lime juice (1/2 of 1 small lime)

instructions.en: Heat butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Liberally season both sides of chicken breasts with rotisserie chicken seasoning.
Brown the chicken on both sides in the hot butter. Remove chicken from pan.
Add cream cheese and cream to the skillet. Over low heat, whisk to blend well as cream cheese melts.
Whisk in lime juice and stir in cilantro.
Return chicken to pan; cover and simmer for 15 minutes, turning after about 7 minutes.
Place cooked chicken on serving plates and pour about 1/4 cup of sauce over each serving.

notes: * McCormick Rotisserie Chicken seasoning can be substituted with your favorite seasoning salt or Mexican seasoning. Watch out for sugar in commercial blends. This recipe makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. The sauce doesn't reheat well.
